Articles.Content:
Hi, i want to build a new space station, but when i want to dock two parts of the space station (the lab and the center), i can't dock them. There is any problem ?

(Excuse me about my english )
ISS.LAB seems to have the Sr docking port placed on the opposite orientation.

Before docking, check both docking rings. If there is a "Undock" option, this mean you placed this docking ring backward.

4 options

- Forget about docking

- Deorbit the wrong section and send a new one

- Edit your save file.

- Send a dirty part : a claw and a correctly oplaced docking ring. Will look ugly

ISS.LAB seems to have the Sr docking port placed on the opposite orientation.

No "seems to" about it. That is no doubt on backwards.
